it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.model.items.weapons

Class WeaponCardState

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.model.items.weapons.WeaponCardState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LoadedState, PickupState, UnloadedState

    public abstract class WeaponCardState
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Represents the state of a weapon card.

    It provides methods to check whether the weapon can be used to shoot and also to transition to a new state from this one.

    Author:
    Alessandro Fulgini, Lorenzo Farinelli, Tiziano Fucci
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected WeaponCardState(String type)
      Creates a new weapon card state, with a string identifier

      abstract boolean isUsable()
      Returns whether a weapon in this state can be used to shoot or not
      abstract void reload(Player player, WeaponCard weapon)
      Reloads the weapon if it's not fully loaded.
      void reset(WeaponCard weapon)
      Resets the weapon to the state it has when it's on a square (before being grabbed)
      String toString() 
      void unload(WeaponCard weapon)
      The weapon is set to a state where it cannot be used because it has just shot.

    • Constructor Detail

      • WeaponCardState

        protected WeaponCardState(String type)
        Creates a new weapon card state, with a string identifier
        Parameters:
        type - A string which identifies the state, not null and unique for every state

    • Method Detail

      • isUsable

        public abstract boolean isUsable()
        Returns whether a weapon in this state can be used to shoot or not
        Returns:
        true if a weapon in this state can be used to shoot, false otherwise

      • reload

        public abstract void reload(Player player,
                            WeaponCard weapon)
        Reloads the weapon if it's not fully loaded. The player is asked to pay for the remaining ammo cubes:
        • If he can pay, the weapon will be brought to a usable state
        • If he can't pay, the weapon will remain in the current state
        Parameters:
        player - The player who reloads the weapon, not null
        weapon - The weapon holding this state, not null

      • unload

        public void unload(WeaponCard weapon)
        The weapon is set to a state where it cannot be used because it has just shot.
        Parameters:
        weapon - The weapon holding this state, not null

      • reset

        public void reset(WeaponCard weapon)
        Resets the weapon to the state it has when it's on a square (before being grabbed)
        Parameters:
        weapon - The weapon holding this state, not null

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
